TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SoapHeader extends System.Object

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，表示 SOAP 標頭的內容。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, represents the content of a SOAP header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SOAP 標頭提供傳遞資料以及從 XML Web service 方法，如果 XML Web 服務方法的主要功能不直接相關資料的方法。SOAP headers offer a method for passing data to and from an XML Web service method if the data is not directly related to the XML Web service method's primary functionality. 例如，XML Web 服務可能包含數個 XML Web service 方法，每個需要自訂驗證配置。For instance, an XML Web service might contain several XML Web service methods that each require a custom authentication scheme. 而不是將參數加入至每個 XML Web 服務方法的自訂驗證配置， 、 參考至類別，衍生自，可以套用至每個 XML Web service 方法。Instead of adding parameters to each XML Web service method for the custom authentication scheme, a , referring to a class deriving from , can be applied to each XML Web service method. 從衍生類別實作處理自訂驗證配置。The implementation for the class deriving from handles the custom authentication scheme. 這種方式，XML Web service 方法實作僅它特有的功能，並加入其他功能使用 SOAP 標頭。In this manner, the XML Web service method implements only the functionality specific to it and adds additional functionality using a SOAP header. 下列清單會列出接收和處理 SOAP 標頭的基本步驟：The following list outlines the basic steps to receiving and processing a SOAP header: 1. 建立衍生自類別表示資料傳入的 SOAP 標頭。Create a class that derives from representing the data passed into the SOAP header. 2. 將成員加入至類別實作 XML Web 服務或 XML Web 服務用戶端 proxy 類別，第一個步驟中建立的類型。Add a member to the class implementing an XML Web service or an XML Web service client proxy class, of the type created in the first step. 3. 套用XML Web service 方法或在 proxy 類別中對應的方法，指定成員中建立第二個步驟屬性。Apply a to the XML Web service method or the corresponding method in the proxy class, specifying the member created in the second step in the property. 4. 在 XML Web 服務方法或 XML Web 服務用戶端程式碼，存取屬性來處理 SOAP 標頭中傳送的資料。Within the XML Web service method or XML Web service client code, access the property to process the data sent in the SOAP header. ## Examples 下列`MyWebService`XML Web 服務定義`MyHeader`SOAP 標頭，並需要將它與任何呼叫一起傳送`MyWebMethod`XML Web service 方法。The following `MyWebService` XML Web service defines the `MyHeader` SOAP header and requires it to be sent with any calls to the `MyWebMethod` XML Web service method. 此外，`MyWebMethod`接收任何 SOAP 標頭以外`MyHeader`SOAP 標頭。Additionally, `MyWebMethod` receives any SOAP headers other than the `MyHeader` SOAP header.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Actor { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 SOAP 標頭的收件者。

span.span: Gets or sets the recipient of the SOAP header.
The recipient of the SOAP header.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要設定 SOAP 標頭的收件者，設定屬性。To set the recipient of a SOAP header, set the property. 不論用來與 XML Web 服務通訊的 SOAP 通訊協定版本，.NET Framework 會自動產生的 SOAP 通訊協定版本特有的 SOAP 訊息。Regardless of the version of the SOAP protocol used to communicate with an XML Web service, the .NET Framework automatically generates the SOAP message specific to the version of the SOAP protocol. 具體而言，XML 項目與 XML 命名空間代表收件者與不同的兩個版本中。Specifically, the XML element and XML namespace representing the recipient differ for the two versions. XML Web 服務接收的 SOAP 標頭可以藉由取得其中取得預定的收件者或屬性。XML Web services receiving the SOAP header can get the intended recipient by getting either the or properties. 為收件者`Body`項目和每個 SOAP 標頭內`Header`SOAP 訊息的項目不需要相同。The recipient(s) for the `Body` element and each of the SOAP headers within the `Header` element of a SOAP message need not be the same. 如果`Header`SOAP 訊息中的項目存在，它代表 XML Web service 方法或媒介可以傳送的其他資料。If a `Header` element exists in the SOAP message, it represents additional data that can be sent to and from the XML Web service method or an intermediary. 收件者的資料，又稱為 SOAP`Actor`在 1.1 版中，可以是不同的 URI，比 XML Web service 方法的 URI。The recipient of that data, known as the SOAP `Actor` in version 1.1, can be a different URI than the URI for the XML Web service method. 如需有關 SOAP`actor`屬性，請參閱在 SOAP 規格http://www.w3.org/TR/SOAP/。For more information on the SOAP `actor` attribute, see the SOAP specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/SOAP/. ## Examples 下列的 XML Web 服務用戶端呼叫`MyWebMethod`XML Web service 方法，在建立類型的自訂 SOAP 標頭之後`MyHeader`和設定屬性`http://www.contoso.com/MySoapHeaderHandler`。The following XML Web service client calls the `MyWebMethod` XML Web service method after creating a custom SOAP header of type `MyHeader` and setting the property to `http://www.contoso.com/MySoapHeaderHandler`. [!code-cpp[Classic SoapHeader.Actor Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHeader.Actor Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic SoapHeader.Actor Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHeader.Actor Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic SoapHeader.Actor Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHeader.Actor Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DidUnderstand { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出 XML Web Service 方法是否已適當地處理 SOAP 標頭。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an XML Web service method properly processed a SOAP header.

value.span: 如果 SOAP 標頭已適當地處理，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the SOAP header was properly processed; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML Web 服務所定義的 SOAP 標頭，ASP.NET 會假設 XML Web 服務方法才能正確處理 SOAP 標頭設定的初始值至`true`。For SOAP headers defined by an XML Web service, ASP.NET assumes the XML Web service method properly processed the SOAP header by setting the initial value of to `true`. 初始值會是未定義的 XML Web 服務的 SOAP 標頭， `false`。For SOAP headers not defined by the XML Web service, the initial value is `false`. 如果 ASP.NET 偵測到的 SOAP 標頭會傳遞至 XML Web 服務方法使用設`false`方法傳回之後，擲回給 XML Web 服務用戶端，而結果不是從 XML Web 服務方法。If ASP.NET detects SOAP headers passed to an XML Web service method with set to `false` after the method returns, a is thrown back to the XML Web service client instead of the results from the XML Web service method. ## Examples 下列`MyWebService`XML Web 服務定義`MyHeader`SOAP 標頭，並需要將它與任何呼叫一起傳送`MyWebMethod`XML Web service 方法。The following `MyWebService` XML Web service defines the `MyHeader` SOAP header and requires it to be sent with any calls to the `MyWebMethod` XML Web service method. 此外，`MyWebMethod`接收任何 SOAP 標頭以外`MyHeader`SOAP 標頭。Additionally, the `MyWebMethod` receives any SOAP headers other than the `MyHeader` SOAP header. SOAP 標頭，`MyWebMethod`可以處理設`true`。For SOAP headers that `MyWebMethod` can process, is set to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ EncodedMustUnderstand { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 與 SOAP 通訊協定 1.1 版通訊時，取得或設定 SOAP 標頭的 XML 屬性值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the XML attribute for the SOAP header when communicating with SOAP protocol version 1.1.
The value of the attribute.
The default is "0".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請勿使用這個屬性。Do not use this property. 改用屬性。Instead use the property. ## Examples [!code-cpp[SoapHeader_EncodedMustUnderstand#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapHeader_EncodedMustUnderstand/CPP/soapheader_encodedmustunderstand.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapHeader_EncodedMustUnderstand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapHeader_EncodedMustUnderstand/CS/soapheader_encodedmustunderstand.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapHeader_EncodedMustUnderstand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapHeader_EncodedMustUnderstand/VB/soapheader_encodedmustunderstand.vb#1)]

exception.span: 屬性值會設為 "0"、"1"、"true" 或 "false" 以外的值。

span.span: The property is set to a value other than: "0", "1", "true", or "false".

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ EncodedMustUnderstand12 { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 與 SOAP 通訊協定 1.2 版通訊時，取得或設定 SOAP 標頭的 XML 屬性值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the XML attribute for the SOAP header when communicating with SOAP protocol version 1.2.

value.span: SOAP 標頭之 XML 屬性的值。

span.span: The value of the XML attribute of a SOAP header.
The default is "0".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請勿使用這個屬性。Do not use this property. 改用屬性。Instead use the property.

exception.span: 屬性值會設為 "0"、"1"、"true" 或 "false" 以外的值。

span.span: The property is set to a value other than: "0", "1", "true", or "false".

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ EncodedRelay { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 SOAP 1.2 標頭的轉送屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets the relay attribute of the SOAP 1.2 header.
Either "0", "false", "1", or "true".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性僅適用於 SOAP 1.2，表示訊息的收件者將此標頭轉送時它是否轉寄訊息到下游的下一個節點。The property applies only to SOAP 1.2 and indicates whether the recipient of the message forwards this header when it forwards the message to the next node downstream. 因為.NET Framework 不支援 SOAP 媒介，這個屬性會序列化和還原序列化，但忽略。Because the .NET Framework does not support SOAP intermediaries, this property is serialized and deserialized but ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool MustUnderstand { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否必須辨認 。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the must be understood.

value.span: 如果 XML Web Service 必須適當地解譯和處理 ，則為 ，否則，即為 。

span.span: if the XML Web service must properly interpret and process the ; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當 XML Web 服務用戶端將 SOAP 標頭加入至具有的 XML Web 服務方法呼叫屬性設定為`true`，XML Web 服務方法必須設定屬性`true`，否則擲回由 ASP.NET XML Web 服務用戶端。When an XML Web service client adds a SOAP header to an XML Web service method call with the property set to `true`, the XML Web service method must set the property to `true`; otherwise, a is thrown back to the XML Web service client by ASP.NET. 雖然同時和屬性可以用來設定的值`mustUnderstand`中 SOAP 標頭屬性屬性可讓您將使用布林值屬性設定。Although both the and properties can be used to set the value of the `mustUnderstand` attribute within the SOAP header, the property allows you to set the attribute using a Boolean value. 如需將 SOAP 標頭加入至用戶端的詳細資訊，請參閱[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7bd961f2-b492-48d0-bafe-09d5d5fec3ba)。For details on adding SOAP headers to clients, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7bd961f2-b492-48d0-bafe-09d5d5fec3ba). ## Examples 下列 XML Web 服務用戶端定義類型的自訂 SOAP 標頭`MyHeader`，設定屬性`true`，並叫用`MyWebMethod`XML Web service 方法。The following XML Web service client defines a custom SOAP header of type `MyHeader`, sets the property to `true`, and invokes the `MyWebMethod` XML Web service method. 如果 XML Web 服務方法並不會設定屬性`MyHeader`SOAP 標頭來`true`、就會擲回。If the XML Web service method does not set the property of the `MyHeader` SOAP header to `true`, a is thrown. [!code-cpp[Classic SoapHeader.MustUnderstand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHeader.MustUnderstand Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic SoapHeader.MustUnderstand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHeader.MustUnderstand Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic SoapHeader.MustUnderstand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHeader.MustUnderstand Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Relay { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出如果目前節點無法辨認標頭，是否會將 SOAP 標頭轉送至下一個 SOAP 節點。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the SOAP header is to be relayed to the next SOAP node if the current node does not understand the header.

value.span: 如果 SOAP 標頭的 "relay" 屬性設為 "true" 則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the SOAP header has a "relay" attribute set to "true"; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設的 SOAP 1.2 處理規則需要 SOAP 節點移除不了解 SOAP 處理節點，然後將傳遞訊息的下一個節點的標頭。The default SOAP 1.2 processing rules require SOAP nodes to remove headers that are not understood by the SOAP processing node before passing the message on to the next node.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Role { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 SOAP 標頭的收件者。

span.span: Gets or sets the recipient of the SOAP header.

value.span: URI，表示 SOAP 標頭的收件者。

span.span: A URI that represents the recipient of the SOAP header.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要設定 SOAP 標頭的收件者，設定屬性。To set the recipient of a SOAP header, set the property. 不論用來與 XML Web 服務通訊的 SOAP 通訊協定版本，.NET Framework 會自動產生的 SOAP 通訊協定版本特有的 SOAP 訊息。Regardless of the version of the SOAP protocol used to communicate with an XML Web service, the .NET Framework automatically generates the SOAP message specific to the version of the SOAP protocol. 具體而言，XML 項目與 XML 命名空間代表收件者與不同的兩個版本中。Specifically, the XML element and XML namespace representing the recipient differ for the two versions. XML Web 服務接收的 SOAP 標頭可以藉由取得其中取得預定的收件者或屬性。XML Web services receiving the SOAP header can get the intended recipient by getting either the or properties. 為收件者`Body`項目和每個 SOAP 標頭內`Header`SOAP 訊息的項目不需要相同。The recipient(s) for the `Body` element and each of the SOAP headers within the `Header` element of a SOAP message need not be the same. 如果`Header`SOAP 訊息中的項目存在，它代表 XML Web service 方法或媒介可以傳送的其他資料。If a `Header` element exists in the SOAP message, it represents additional data that can be sent to and from the XML Web service method or an intermediary. 收件者的資料，又稱為 SOAP `Role` SOAP 規格和 SOAP 1.2 版中`Actor`在 1.1 版中，可以是不同的 URI，比 XML Web service 方法的 URI。The recipient of that data, known as the SOAP `Role` in version 1.2 of the SOAP specification and the SOAP `Actor` in version 1.1, can be a different URI than the URI for the XML Web service method. 如需有關 SOAP`actor`屬性，請參閱在 SOAP 規格http://www.w3.org/TR/SOAP/。For more information on the SOAP `actor` attribute, see the SOAP specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/SOAP/.
